a.title: Grady's Plan for the Coronavirus Pandemic

div.a: Grady's Plan for the Coronavirus Pandemic

div.h1: Grady's Plan for the Coronavirus Pandemic

div.div: Our Plan for the COVID-19 Pandemic

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled Our Plan for the COVID-19 Pandemic

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Calibri, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;

img.span: Due to the Coronavirus Pandemic, Grady Municipal Schools will not resume classes again until April 6th. We will provide meals beginning Monday, March 23rd to in-district students. Clovis students may get meals at any Clovis School or at Plains Regional Hospital. If you are interested in receiving meals for your student(s) please contact 575-357-2192 and leave your name and contact information.
